full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Office Furniture

## Solicitation Details

| Field Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3702849545 |
| Solicitation Title | Office Furniture |
| Category | Furniture and Furnishings |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services |
| Government of Canada Contracting Agency | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| End-User Government Agency | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |

## Tender Overview

This tender invitation is for the acquisition of office furniture encompassing multiple product categories (1-6) from the SA Canada manufacturing sector, for delivery within Canada. The tender is now closed due to the expiration date set for November 3, 2022.

## Tender Terms and Conditions

- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: The tender is open to suppliers that have entered into the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

## Key Dates

- **Publication Date**: October 11, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 3, 2022 at 02:00 p.m. EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 7, 2022
- **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2023

## Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact:

Shannon Brewster
[Brewster, Shannon](mailto:shannon.brewster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
Canada

## Request for Tender Documents

The tender documents, including supporting documentation, can be accessed through the following links:

* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14334067?extsite=MTQzMzQwNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14334067?extsite=MTQzMzQwNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk
